channel.title: Tutorial: How to make ANTI-FOOD System(Command & Tab)
channel.description:
[u][b]Anti-FOOD System (Command And Tab)[/b][/u] (When You Enter Command Or Click Tab/Button It HEALS!)
Source I Used: AllStar (EASY) Difficulty: Easy Requirments: A Source(Mainly Just Client.Java), And Brain.
[u][glow=red,2,300]1ST:[/glow][/u] -Open Client.Java -Search(Cntrl+F) and enter [i]HOME"[/i] or [i]PICKUP"[/i] ...Something Like That
[u][glow=red,2,300]2ND:[/glow][/u] Then look for the final bracket (}), then past the following code below it.
[u][b]CODE:[/b][/u] [code]if (command.startsWith("healmeh")) { sendMessage("You've been healed."); playerLevel[3] += 15; hitDiff = -heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; }[/code]
[b]Then Save and Compile** Then Just Run Your Server! :D[/b]
EXAMPLE WHEN DONE: (In Text, Not Picture) HaHa Sorry. ___________________ ____________________ |99/99||20/99||99/99| (-After Button-) |99/99||35/99||99/99| |99/99||99/99||99/99| -->> OR |99/99||20/99||99/99| |99/99||99/99||99/99| (After Command) |99/99||20/99||99/99| ___________________ ____________________
[u][b]NOW FOR THE BUTTON/TAB: [/u] (In The EMOTES Thing)[/b] -Go INTO Your Client.Java -Search "Case 169" or "Case 168". Something Like That P.S. If you find a Case 169, Delete it and put this: (If NOT Just Add It UNDER One)
[u]CODE:[/u] [code] case 169: { customCommand("healmeh"); // made 100% by Silver/YungBubba break; }[/code]
Save+Compile. Ect... :P Please Rep++ If You Like The Look Of It, Even Think You Would Use It, Or USED It! Please Comment!!!!!

item.title: Tutorial: How to make ANTI-FOOD System(Command & Tab)
item.dc:creator: @theyungbubba theyungbubba
item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

Anti-FOOD System (Command And Tab) (When You Enter Command Or Click Tab/Button It HEALS!)

Source I Used: AllStar (EASY)
Difficulty: Easy
Requirments: A Source(Mainly Just Client.Java), And Brain.

[glow=red,2,300]1ST:[/glow]
-Open Client.Java
-Search(Cntrl+F) and enter HOME" or PICKUP" …Something Like That

[glow=red,2,300]2ND:[/glow]
Then look for the final bracket (}), then past the following code below it.

CODE:

if (command.startsWith("healmeh")) { sendMessage("You've been healed."); playerLevel[3] += 15; hitDiff = -heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; }

Then Save and Compile**
Then Just Run Your Server!

EXAMPLE WHEN DONE: (In Text, Not Picture) HaHa Sorry.

|99/99||20/99||99/99| (-After Button-) |99/99||35/99||99/99|
|99/99||99/99||99/99| -->> OR |99/99||20/99||99/99|
|99/99||99/99||99/99| (After Command) |99/99||20/99||99/99|

[b]NOW FOR THE BUTTON/TAB: (In The EMOTES Thing)[/b]
-Go INTO Your Client.Java
-Search “Case 169” or “Case 168”. Something Like That
P.S. If you find a Case 169, Delete it and put this: (If NOT Just Add It UNDER One)

CODE:

case 169: { customCommand("healmeh"); // made 100% by Silver/YungBubba break; }

Save+Compile. Ect…
Please Rep++ If You Like The Look Of It, Even Think You Would Use It, Or USED It!
Please Comment!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Tutorial: How to make ANTI-FOOD System(Command & Tab)
